title: Big Life - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Beautiful Female Lead   Books   Caring Protagonist   Celebrities   Cheats   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Pets   Poor to Rich   Slow Romance   Writers
author: Woo Ji-Ho   우지호
description:
Death, Depression, Poverty, Love issues – all things that a 27-year-old no-name writer faces.

Yet, with one fateful day, one fateful supernatural event, he gains the powers of a dead genius writer. Everything changes after that, and success after success comes to him.

Yet, he has a rival in love and writing, one who is also a famous writer and son of an international publishing corporation. This rival will do anything he can with his influence to beat him into submission.

This is a story of a writer, who must succeed against all odds.>
